/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided by a concrete barrier, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The perspective of the image is from the left side of the street, looking towards the right, giving a sense of depth and scale to the cityscape. The image does not contain any text or discernible actions. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban layout, with buildings neatly aligned along the street. The image does not provide enough detail to confidently count the number of buildings or other objects. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the cityscape.
